channel.title: CVE Feed for Everest themes -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Everest themes -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-41235|2024-09-20T19:52:18.062Z -- everest%20themes -- everest%20news%20pro
item.description: Unauth. Reflected Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Everest Themes Everest News Pro theme <= 1.1.7 versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-41237|2024-09-20T19:50:18.893Z -- everest%20themes -- arya%20multipurpose%20pro
item.description: Unauth. Reflected Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Everest Themes Arya Multipurpose Pro theme <= 1.0.8 versions.

item.title: CVE-2024-32531|2024-07-15T20:13:44.554Z -- everest%20themes -- gucherry%20blog
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Everest themes GuCherry Blog allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects GuCherry Blog: from n/a through 1.1.8.

item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Everest themes GuCherry Blog allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects GuCherry Blog: from n/a through 1.1.8.
